import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import './App.css'; class BookingForm extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { name: '', email: '', street: '', city: '', state: '', zip: '', bookingType: '', date: '', time: '' } } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); }; submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state); }; render(){ const { name, email, street, city, state, zip, bookingType, date, time } = this.state; return(
) } }; export default BookingForm;
